PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06662018-05-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC,  OAG
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment KPMG LLP as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditor of the Canada Post Corporation
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) KPMG LLP, Chartered Accountants, of Toronto, Ontario, as AUDITOR of the CANADA POST CORPORATION for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2018; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA POST CORPORATION for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
